title: Can't skin boost
body: I have a total of 315 leftover rp and decided to use it on some skin boosts in ARAM for the extra IP. But everytime I go into an ARAM game, the skin boost button is gray and I am not able to click it despite having more than enough IP.

replies.body: ARAM skins boosts have been temporarily disabled due to a bug.
Oh okay, thanks for the response. Just out of curiosity what is the bug, and is the skin boost expected to return anytime soon?

Bump.
It's been like a week already, any updates on why this is occurring/ expected to be resolved?

I've paid actual money to do skin boosts and now I can't for over a week. If the bug had any priority it would be fixed. Stop developing new content and fix a basic monetization issue on your game guys. I don't mind spending money on it, but I would sure love to be able to spend my currency in the game.

It looks like Skin boost activation is currently unavailable.  There is an announcement on our [Service Status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, and further updates should be provided there.
Ok, Thank you for the info
This is still happening to me wtf
Dont worry, this is still a thing for me also haha.  {{summoner:3}}
